participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and creative, loves nature and the arts.
participant_1.background: I am going to take a yoga class to stay in shape and work on my Swedish. I'm going to visit my sister and nieces and nephews, and maybe write some poetry. After a long day at work, my favorite way to unwind is to watch anime and superhero shows. I have always loved roses so the first thing I remember buying was a rose bush for my garden. I love to swim in the lake, even if it makes me a weirdo.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Resilient and creative, enjoys cooking and is a bit of a homebody.
participant_2.background: I've been in a bit of a funk since my house was robbed, but creating new recipes always helps me feel better. My favorite fruit is apple. I'm single and I live with my cat, Speckles. My favorite holiday is Halloween and I am chubby.

content.text: I'm a bit down but I'm trying to keep my head up.
Oh no, I'm sorry. What's wrong?
My house was robbed and it really threw me for a loop.
Oh no, that's awful! I'm so sorry to hear that.
Thanks. It's been a tough few weeks.
What have you been doing to cope?
I've been creating new recipes and trying to stay busy.
That's great! I love to cook too. What are your favorite recipes?
I love making apple pie and chocolate chip cookies.
Ooh, those sound delicious! I love apple pie.
Me too! It's my favorite fruit.
I love to watch anime and superhero shows.
Oh, me too! I'm a big fan of My Hero Academia.
Me too! I love that show.
I'm glad to hear you're finding ways to cope. I hope things start looking up for you soon.
